com.st.st25sdk.ndef

Class NDEFRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.ndef.NDEFRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AarRecord, BtLeRecord, BtRecord, EmailRecord, EmptyRecord, ExternalRecord, MimeRecord, SmsRecord, TextRecord, UriRecord, VCardRecord, WifiRecord

    public class NDEFRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implements NDEF record format functions
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • dbgCheckNdefRecordContent

        protected void dbgCheckNdefRecordContent(byte[] originalPayload)
        This function is ONLY USED FOR DEBUG. It checks that the payload of this NDEF record is identical to the original NDEFRecord payload. It allows to check that payload parsing and serialization are correct.
        Parameters:
        originalPayload -
